NRSectorCarrier.description: Represents the resources of each transmission point included in the cell.

arfcnDL.description: NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number (NR-ARFCN) for downlink. Condition: The sector-carrier has a downlink AND the value differs from the referring cell's value of arfcnDL.

arfcnUL.description: NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number (NR-ARFCN) for uplink. Condition: The sector-carrier has an uplink AND the value differs from the referring cell's value of arfcnUL.

bSChannelBwDL.description: Base station channel bandwitdth for downlink. Condition: The sector-carrier has a downlink AND the value differs from the referring cell's value of bSChannelBwDL.

bSChannelBwUL.description: Base station channel bandwitdth for uplink.

configuredMaxTxEIRP.description: The maximum emitted isotroptic radiated power (EIRP) in dBm for all downlink channels, used simultaneously in a cell, added together. Condition: the sector-carrier has a downlink and the configuration of emitted isotropic radiated power is supported

configuredMaxTxPower.description: Maximum transmisssion power at the antenna port for all downlink channels, used simultaneously in a cell, added together. Condition: The sector-carrier has a downlink and the configuration of Tx power at antenna port reference point is supported.

txDirection.description: Indicates if the transmission direction is downlink, uplink, or both downlink and uplink.
